description: Cetrizine is an antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms like runny nose, itching, and watery eyes. It is effective for hay fever and hives.
Paracetamol is used to treat mild to moderate pain and reduce fever. It is commonly used for headaches, muscle aches, and cold-related symptoms.
Amoxicillin is a penicillin antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections, including pneumonia, bronchitis, and infections of the ear, nose, and throat.
Cough Syrup is used to relieve coughing caused by minor throat and bronchial irritation, often associated with a cold or inhaled irritants.
Omeprazole is used to treat acid reflux, heartburn, and stomach ulcers by reducing the amount of acid produced in the stomach.
ORS Solution is used to treat dehydration caused by diarrhea or vomiting. It restores essential salts and fluids in the body.
